column4: could someone with some experience with java plz PM me. I want to get mine up and running
he's gone .. if only he waited 30 seconds:
for java: download the .bin file from java.sun.com, apt-get install java-package, chmod +x [the .bin file] , make-jpkg [the bin file] , dpkg -i [the generated .deb file]
I did all that and this is the msg I get < Java exec found in PATH. Verifying...
